column_description: Unique identifier for each project, serves as primary key of this table, cannot be NULL.
value_description: Universally unique identifier (UUID) used to distinguish each project record.

column_description: The name or title of the project. Cannot be NULL
value_description: Example: 宝马汽车2024-2026年年框设计项目. Represents the project name.

column_description: Foreign key referencing the uuid of the team table. Can be NULL
value_description: Links the project to the team responsible for it. NULL if no team is assigned.

column_description: The location or address where the project is being executed.
value_description: Example: 全国, 京城大厦.

column_description: The category of the project, used to indicate which stage the project is currently on.
value_description: Include values like: 邀请招标, 投标, 直委, 议价, 邀请, 无, 委托, 客户介绍, 邀请投标, 邀请招投标, 公开招投标, 老客户, 施工, 公开招标, 商业改造运营, 非投标, 邀标. For example, 投标 indicate the project is ready to sign contract.

column_description: The total area of the project site.
value_description: Example: 200.0. Represents the area in square meters or other units.

column_description: The date when the project was signed or initiated.
The projected completion date for the project.
The total expected revenue from the project.
value_description: Example: 6800000.00. Represents revenue in a specific currency.

column_description: Additional notes or remarks regarding the project revenue.
value_description: Optional; may provide detailed explanations or references for revenue calculations.

column_description: Foreign key referencing the uuid of the client table. Can be NULL.
value_description: Links the project to the client. NULL if no client is assigned.
